<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/rust/02_simple/source.rs">

struct SourceFile {
    pub path: String,
}

mod Summarizable;

mod impl SourceFile {

    fn new(path: String, content: String) -> Self

    fn line_count(&self: ) -> u32
}

mod impl Summarizable for SourceFile;

mod FileOperations;

mod FileError {
    let NotFound;
    let PermissionDenied;
    let InvalidContent;
}

mod impl FileOperations for SourceFile;
</file>
